Summarization.Traditional Summary:
RENTAL AGREEMENT
THIS RENTAL AGREEMENT is made on this 15th day of May, 2025 at Mumbai
BETWEEN
Mr. Rajesh Kumar, Son of Mr. Suresh Kumar, aged about 48 years, residing at 123, Sea View Apartments, Bandra West, Mumbai - 400050, Maharashtra, India. ( Hereinafter referred to as the "LANDLORD")
AND
Ms. Priya Sharma, Daughter of Mr. Anil Sharma, aged about 32 years, residing at 456, Green Valley, Powai, Mumbai - 400076, Maharashtra, India. ( NOW THIS AGREEMENT WITNESSETH AND IT IS HEREBY AGREED BY AND BETWEEN THE PARTIES HERETO AS FOLLOWS:

TERM OF TENANCY:
The Landlord hereby lets out the Premises to the Tenant for a period of 11 (Eleven) months commencing from 1st June, 2025 and ending on 30th April, 2026. RENT:
The Tenant shall pay to the Landlord a monthly rent of Rs. 35,000/- (Rupees Thirty-Five Thousand Only) payable in advance on or before the 5th day of each English calendar month. MAINTENANCE CHARGES:
The Tenant shall pay the monthly maintenance charges of Rs. USE OF PREMISES:
The Tenant shall use the Premises for residential purpose only and shall not use the same for any illegal or immoral purposes or for any purpose which may cause nuisance or annoyance to the neighbors or other occupants of the building. GOVERNING LAW:
This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of India. DISPUTE RESOLUTION:
Any dispute arising out of or in connection with this Agreement shall be resolved amicably between the parties.
